CLUE: Traditionally the author of the third Gospel
FOUND IN: Evangelist: As one of the Four Evangelists, alongside Mark, Luke, and John, he played an essential part in writing and disseminating the Christian faith to the broader world
London Boroughs: Westminster, as the location of the iconic Houses of Parliament

Cashmere: Produced by cashmere goats; however, it doesn't exactly match "fine goat's wool." But due to its high-quality nature and softness, we can loosely relate it to the desired description of fine wool.
Real estate: A legal term encompassing all types of property ownership and transaction, including land.
